attributes.action: Allow parents over age of 65 who are living alone can come to join us in uk.
attributes.additional_details: We want our old parents with us so that we can provide them care that they deserve and we fulfill our responsibilities towards our parents.
attributes.background: No public fund will be used for their care.Having them around, it will help my child to relate to my culture, strengthen my child's bond with his grandparents and help him understand family relationships.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you want certain people to be able to come to the UK, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

It is already possible to apply for a family visa to come to the UK to live with a child, or other relative who’ll provide long-term care for you: https://www.gov.uk/uk-family-visa

If you want the Government to change the rules for who is eligible for family visas, you could start a new petition explaining clearly what you changes you would like to be made to these rules.
